'''Uzad''' was an [[The Eremites|Eremite]] and a member of the [[Tanit]] tribe. 

==Profile==
Uzad's name is mentioned by [[Jeht]] when the [[Traveler]] encounters her after her capture by the [[Fatui]]. Given the context of the conversation, [[Babel]] presumably ordered Jeht to assassinate them.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}</ref>
